entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Risk of thunderstorms this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
